# ToolBar

- **ControlName**: ToolBar
- **CodeFile**: System/Windows/Controls/ToolBar.cs
- **BaseClass**: HeaderedItemsControl
- **ControlType**: ItemsControl
- **ContentProperty**: Items

## Template parts

| Part Name | Part Type | Description |
|-----------|-----------|-------------|
| PART_ToolBarPanel | ToolBarPanel | The main panel that contains the toolbar items. |
| PART_ToolBarOverflowPanel | ToolBarOverflowPanel | The panel that contains items that don't fit in the main toolbar area. |

## Visual states

This control doesn't define any visual states.
